description: Retrieves a list that describes the theme for a specified stack. A theme is custom branding that customizes the appearance of the streaming application catalog page.

parameters.name: StackName
parameters.description: The name of the stack for the theme.

nested_items.name: StackName
nested_items.description: The stack that has the custom branding theme.

nested_items.name: ThemeStyling
nested_items.description: The color that is used for the website links, text, buttons, and catalog page background.

nested_items.name: ThemeFooterLinks
nested_items.description: The website links that display in the catalog page footer.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The name of the websites that display in the catalog page footer.

nested_items.name: FooterLinkURL
nested_items.description: The URL of the websites that display in the catalog page footer.

nested_items.name: ThemeOrganizationLogoURL
nested_items.description: The URL of the logo that displays in the catalog page header.

nested_items.name: ThemeFaviconURL
nested_items.description: The URL of the icon that displays at the top of a user's browser tab during streaming sessions.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The time the theme was created.
